text:
Atlas Wearablees | Austin, TX | Full time | Front End Developer | https://www.atlaswearables.com/careers/

Atlas designs and shapes the future of computing products. Atlas Wristband is a fitness monitor that identifies your exercises, counts your reps and sets, calculates the calories you burned and evaluates your form.

POSITION DESCRIPTION We are currently looking for a skilled front-end web developer to help design and maintain the Atlas Wearables public site, user dashboard and HTML5-based mobile apps; all in a motivated and creative environment with a close-knit team.

Our stack is Python/Django/Maria+Redis+Mongo/Angular (moving to React)/Cordova

For more info contact seth@atlaswearables.com
